Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications)[Right] is escorted by Dr. A. L. Mudaliar [Middle] and Prof. B. Sengupto [Left]
Description: The Third Institute Day took place at the Institute’s Building Sciences Block on the IITM campus. The chief guest for the event was Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications). In the image, from the left, Prof. B. Sengupto and Dr. A. L. Mudaliar escort Dr. P. Subbarayan to the Building Sciences Block where the ceremony took place. A large ‘Welcome’ sign and the number of chairs laid out indicate the importance of the ceremony.
